20110106070055.000|20110106070056.000|CC1|NEIGHBORHOOD IN THE CITY OF     
20110106070056.000|20110106070057.000|CC1|REDLANDS.                       
20110106070057.000|20110106070059.000|CC1|FOUR TEENAGERS WERE SHOT AND    
20110106070059.000|20110106070102.000|CC1|POLICE CONFIRM TWO OF THOSE     
20110106070102.000|20110106070103.000|CC1|TEENS DIED FROM GUNSHOT WOUNDS. 
20110106070103.000|20110106070105.000|CC1|THE OTHER VICTIMS ARE BEING     
20110106070105.000|20110106070108.000|CC1|TREATED AT LOMA LINDA MEDICAL   
20110106070108.000|20110106070108.000|CC1|CENTER.                         
20110106070108.000|20110106070109.000|CC1|WE DON'T KNOW THE IDENTITIES OF 
20110106070109.000|20110106070111.000|CC1|THE TEENAGERS OR THEIR AGES.    
20110106070111.000|20110106070112.000|CC1|WE DO KNOW THE SHOOTING TOOK    
20110106070112.000|20110106070114.000|CC1|PLACE NEAR POST STREET AND      
20110106070114.000|20110106070115.000|CC1|COLTON AVENUE IN REDLANDS.      
20110106070115.000|20110106070118.000|CC1|THE CRIME SCENE AS YOU CAN SEE, 
20110106070118.000|20110106070119.000|CC1|APPEARS TO EXTEND INTO THE      
20110106070119.000|20110106070119.000|CC1|STREET.                         
20110106070119.000|20110106070121.000|CC1|WE HAVE CALLED INTO THE REDLANDS
20110106070121.000|20110106070122.000|CC1|POLICE DEPARTMENT TO FIND OUT IF
20110106070122.000|20110106070124.000|CC1|THEY HAVE A SUSPECT IN CUSTODY  
20110106070124.000|20110106070126.000|CC1|AND TO FIND OUT MORE DETAILS    
20110106070126.000|20110106070128.000|CC1|ABOUT WHAT HAPPENED HERE.       
20110106070128.000|20110106070129.000|CC1|AS SOON AS WE KNOW SOMETHING, WE
20110106070129.000|20110106070131.000|CC1|WILL PASS IT ALONG TO YOU.

20110106070231.000|20110106070231.000|CC1|HELP.

20110106070244.000|20110106070244.000|CC1|HUGE.

20110106070444.000|20110106070445.000|CC1|>> Reporter: EATING FROM A FOOD 
20110106070445.000|20110106070448.000|CC1|TRUCK IS QUICK AND EASY.

20110106070538.000|20110106070539.000|CC1|IF IT IS IN A NEIGHBORHOOD NOT

20110106070541.000|20110106070544.000|CC1|>> Reporter: NO MATTER HOW GOOD 
20110106070544.000|20110106070545.000|CC1|THE FOOD IS.

20110106070559.000|20110106070601.000|CC1|COULD MEAN THEY'VE HAD TROUBLES 
20110106070601.000|20110106070601.000|CC1|BEFORE.

20110106070608.000|20110106070609.000|CC1|PRETTY LATE.

20110106070630.000|20110106070631.000|CC1|>>> TONIGHT THERE IS A NEW      
20110106070631.000|20110106070632.000|CC1|CONGRESS AND A NEW SPEAKER OF   
20110106070632.000|20110106070634.000|CC1|THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES ON.
20110106070634.000|20110106070636.000|CC1|CAPITOL HILL, REPUBLICAN JOHN   
20110106070636.000|20110106070639.000|CC1|BOEHNER RECEIVED THE GAVEL FROM 
20110106070639.000|20110106070640.000|CC1|FORMER SPEAKER CALIFORNIA       
20110106070640.000|20110106070641.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN NANCY PELOSI.     
20110106070641.000|20110106070643.000|CC1|BOEHNER BECOMES THE 53rd SPEAKER
20110106070643.000|20110106070644.000|CC1|OF THE HOUSE.                   
20110106070644.000|20110106070646.000|CC1|A TEN-TERM CONGRESSMAN FROM     
20110106070646.000|20110106070648.000|CC1|OHIO, HE WAS JOINED BY TEN OF   
20110106070648.000|20110106070650.000|CC1|HIS BELOVED BROTHERS AND SISTERS
20110106070650.000|20110106070651.000|CC1|FOR THE CEREMONY TODAY.         
20110106070651.000|20110106070653.000|CC1|THE NEW SPEAKER HAS BECOME      
20110106070653.000|20110106070655.000|CC1|FAMOUS FOR EASILY SHOWING HIS   
20110106070655.000|20110106070656.000|CC1|EMOTIONS AND HE DID IT ONCE     
20110106070656.000|20110106070658.000|CC1|AGAIN TODAY WHEN NANCY PELOSI   
20110106070658.000|20110106070659.000|CC1|INTRODUCED HIS WIFE AND FAMILY  
20110106070659.000|20110106070701.000|CC1|TO THE PACKED CHAMBER.          
20110106070701.000|20110106070704.000|CC1|HE SAID HE IS THRILLED AND VERY 
20110106070704.000|20110106070704.000|CC1|PROUD.                          
20110106070704.000|20110106070916.000|SEG|Type=Story
20110106070704.000|20110106070706.000|CC1|>>> A PROPOSED PAY RAISE FOR
